column5: Decided to quit bothering you guys and go to the store and bother people, bad plan after snow and ice! But this time I made it all the way to the front of the van before I fell! Once I figured out where all the blood was coming from and it was nothing serious I decided to try and get up. When the going gets tough? I did it! Dang felt like ice fishing?  Change of plans now, staying inside! Gotta thaw out I think.
Good to hear the injury wasn't too serious Paul
Sorry to hear about your fall Paul. You best hibernate inside till the ice and snow goes away. Rest up and get better.  Mike
~~~Have met up with my 2 buddies Jack, and Danails, they'll help you get better

Glad to hear you weren't hurt bad Paul, at least with snow and ice you have a good excuse! I took a fall at the boat dock last Tues. that I'm still feeling. Feet flew out from under me on a wet wooden ramp and I landed full force on my tailbone/small of my back. Thought I'd ruined myself for sure. Doin ' better now though.

LOL I walk like jack and daniel are my bestests friends, just tough getting the brain to accept I am losing my mobility. It still thinks I can do stuff normally, creates a clash or crash when the legs don`t listen.  Belly flopped so I had a pretty good cushion, caught heck from the wife, she know`s I can be a little stubborn on trying to do things. Tough after an active life to be trapped indoors by a little snow. Another snow angel in the drive!  Thanks for the thoughts!  MS Sucks!

Damit man I hate when that happens and I don't even have a good excuse Paul!  Ohio in the upright and sitting position      That was a fun day and hopefully we can do it again this season, so no more falls Paul!
Take it easy Paul, spring will be here before you know it.  Jim

Great Phil scare the OFNer`s! any one want to rent me for Halloween?  Don`t wear red while fishing! It`s a warning to the fish! Stop! don`t bite! except sheepheads!  First and last time I wear that in a boat!  LOL Jim, I am starting to understand what the dogs are telling me, worse I am talking back!
Fish don't mind red Paul, you just hafta know how to smile at them
LOL don`t recognize that species in the first picture Lew, you should quit picking on them poor bass though! I think I saw a picture of you with a trace of a grin! Probably photoshopped?
I always try to avoid those bass Paul, but they keep jumping in the way
LOL Lew, ya like that would be frustrating?
